snippet.title: Bound by Blades - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Here's your look at Bound by Blades, an upcoming action RPG focusing on boss battles. The game is coming in Q4 2022 to Steam and releasing later on Nintendo Switch, Android, and iOS devices. Check out the trailer to see some of the bosses you'll battle, crafting elements, and more. Embark on a journey through the magical world of Ashmyr, a once thriving land now left desolate and teeming with Ilcyon, bloodthirsty enemies scattered across the globe. Defeat formidable bosses, meet imaginative NPCs, and learn the lore behind Ashmyr’s mysterious downfall.

#GameTrailers #Gaming #BoundByBlades
